name: Thor
description: Thor, Prince of Asgard, son of Odin the All-Father, wields the mighty hammer Mjolnir, which grants him command over lightning and storms. As an Asgardian, Thor is blessed with superhuman stamina, durability, and speed and stands as one of the strongest beings in the Universe. A stalwart member of the Avengers, Thor never rests in his fight to prove himself worthy.
